Text: Thanks for this fantastic stop motion film. How do I make the subtitle work? I try to turn them on in my different players, but it is not possible?

@ Burroghs: It usually works in vlc without you having to do anyting. You can also burn both files to a DVD and watch it on a DVD player (which reads divX-files). It works for me. All I do is mark the srt-file before playing the film. Good luck.
Thanks for sharing, this is a great stop-motion movie
